org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping.functions

Class BuildVertexGroupItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping.functions.BuildGroupItemBase
      • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping.functions.BuildVertexGroupItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.FlatMapFunction<Vertex,VertexGroupItem>, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.Function

    public class BuildVertexGroupItem
extends BuildGroupItemBase
implements org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.FlatMapFunction<Vertex,VertexGroupItem>
    Creates a minimal representation of vertex data to be used for label specific grouping. The output of that mapper is VertexGroupItem that contains the vertex id, vertex label, vertex group properties and vertex aggregate properties.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
